titleStmt.title: A true and faithful relation of the proceedings of the forces of Their Majesties K. William and Q. Mary in their expedition against the French in the Caribby Islands in the West Indies under the conduct of His Excellency Christopher Codrington ... in the years 1689 and 1690 / written by Thomas Spencer, Jun., secretary to the Honourable Sir Timothy Thornhill ...
titleStmt.author: Spencer, Thomas, secretary to Sir Timothy Thornhill.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
